appName: Hunting Simulator Game: Sniper Hunter VR
displayName: Hunting Simulator Game: Sniper Hunter VR
display_name: Hunting Simulator Game: Sniper Hunter VR
display_long_description:
# Find, aim, shoot - be a hunter, join hunting clash!

Enjoy the hunting game with open world. Hunting Simulator Game isn’t just deer hunting classic or any other wild hunt. This game is made by the real hunter, who is a fan of the sniper shooting. 

Hear the call of the wild and feel like a hunting sniper.
**Deer/buck**, **elk/moose**, **bear** and **wild boar**, **wolf**, **fox** and **hare** are all represented here. Try to find all of them. Be persistent and patient because it could be difficult sometimes to find some of them in the grass and thickets. 
You may not meet them all on your first hunt. But rest assured, they are here and just hiding. 

It may be difficult to shoot the prey at first, but don't give up and keep practicing.

- Use different **hunting rifles and shotguns with scopes** to get your trophies. 

- Use **digital binoculars with thermal visor** if you want to see the target closer.

- The game has a **night hunting mode**. Here it will be effective to use a **thermal visor**.

Be careful cause the animals are dangerous and some of them can attack you! But if they don't attack, consider yourself lucky this time. In any case, you can try your luck with a **knife** in your hands.

# Please, keep in mind that we continue developing and plan to improve the hunting world of the game.

Update is coming! Get ready to compete.

Hear the call of the wild and feel like a hunting sniper.
**Deer/buck**, **elk/moose**, **bear** and **wild boar**, **wolf**, **fox** and **hare** are all represented here. Try to find all of them. Be persistent and patient because it could be difficult sometimes to find some of them in the grass and thickets.

It may be difficult to shoot the prey at first, but don't give up and keep practicing.
